text: The Chew is an American television talk and cooking show. It airs on ABC. It started on September 26, 2011. It replaced the soap opera All My Children. The show's name was inspired by talk show The View. It focuses on food-related and lifestyle topics. It is hosted by Mario Batali, Michael Symon, Carla Hall, Clinton Kelly, and Daphne Oz. On April 11, 2012, ABC announced that the show would air for a second season. On May 23, 2018, ABC announced that it had cancelled The Chew after seven seasons. The final episode aired on June 28, 2018. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2011 American television series debuts Category:American television talk shows Category:English- language television programs Category:2018 American television series endings Category:ABC network series
title: The Chew
